questions.question: (Write) Ways by which animal reproduce
answers: By directly giving birth to young ones
By laying eggs from which baby comes out

questions.question: (Write) How birds look after their young ones
answers: Birds teach them how to fly
Birds look after babies till they get strong

questions.question: (Write) Name 4 stages in lifecycle of butterfly
(Write) What value do you learn frm butterfly
(Write) Fish lay 1000 eggs, only few develop into babies
answers: egs are eaten by other fishes

questions.question: (Write) Describe life-cycle of cockroach
answers: Stage 2: baby comes out of egg(Nymph)
Stage 3: Sheds its skin many times and changes into adult

questions.question: (Write) Describe life-cycle of frog
answers: Stage 1: frog lay cluster of eggs(spawn)
Stage 2: baby tadpole come out of egg in 3 weeks(tin fish, gills)
Stage 3: Tadpole loos their tail and develop legs to become adult

questions.question: (Write)  Describe life-cycle of butterfly
answers: larva(catterpillar) comes out of the egg
